exposedVariables.value: ToolJet is an open-source low-code platform for building and deploying internal tools with minimal engineering efforts 🚀

options.query:
select* from contacts c  JOIN accounts a
    ON c."accountId" = a."id"  where c."owner" ='{{globals.currentUser.email}}' or c."owner" in (select email from users where "reportingManager"='{{globals.currentUser.email}}');
{{queries.update_interactionsJs.data.join(' ')}}
select * from users where "reportingManager"='{{globals.currentUser.email}}';
select * from accounts where owner = '{{globals.currentUser.email}}' or owner in (select email from users where "reportingManager"='{{globals.currentUser.email}}');

select* from contacts c  JOIN accounts a
    ON c."accountId" = a."id"  where c."owner" ='{{globals.currentUser.email}}'and c."accountId"='{{variables.accountId}}' or c."owner" in (select email from users where "reportingManager"='{{globals.currentUser.email}}');
select * from users where "reportingManager"='{{globals.currentUser.email}}';
select * from interaction_types;
{{queries.update_interactionsJs.data.join(' ')}}
